content: with this ziggy grocery bag holder you can clear out that cupboard under the sink and add some functional decor it makes up quick and is a perfect gift sizes small medium large difficulty easy stitches sl single_crochet double_crochet notes mostly composed of double_crochet stitches it is very simple to make pick any two colors - a sports team wedding colors etc or shake things up and use a variegated yarn for a big impact have fun and enjoy if you have any questions or need help please contact me i check my email about once a day except sunday you can also message me through facebook https //www facebook com/brilliantbutton-1473385979545720/ this is a pdf download but i can share it in other forms if you need check out my other patterns https //www etsy com/shop/brilliantbutton ref=simple-shop and like us on facebook to see what else i m making https //www facebook com/brilliantbutton-1473385979545720/
